A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not a perfect film.  The Canto Bight scenes were an unneeded diversion\, and served little other then to give Finn something to do.  They also called back the Prequels in tone\, feel\, and score.  But\, luckily\, they don't stay there long.  The rest film was a great deconstruction and reconstruction moving forward.
